__TOC__

== Testing Hardware Compatibility ==
=== 12.10 kernel on 12.04 user space ===
Below is the list of hardware that is being focused for testing the kernel. If you are unsure of what hardware might be in your machine, you can utilize the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Kernel?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=kerneldrivers.sh|following script]]</nowiki> which will scan your machine's loaded modules and print the matching ones. Add your name under the hardware that your machine contains. Afterwards, please be sure to head over to the call for testing page on the <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.ubuntu.com/qatracker/milestones/223/builds|QATracker]]</nowiki> and add your results. Never used the QAtracker before? Checkout this <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/CallforTesting/Walkthrough|walkthrough]]</nowiki> for participating in a 'call for testing'.
